You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &rho;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Rho;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03a1/index.htm U+003A1].
  * `&rho;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03c1/index.htm U+003C1].
